TopicTitle: Funny Guy: By my Three year old Dauter

Articles.Content: Here is a pic by My three year old Daughter who is a fan of KSP.

Not to be mean or anything, but what is it supposed to be?

It looks like a potato, or maybe the Kraken?

Not to be mean or anything, but what is it supposed to be?

It looks like a potato, or maybe the Kraken?

She is only three and is kinda abstract like your own Post image. The lines are supposed to be the inside of the helmet.

She was trying to make this:

Yeah I would have guessed a Kerbal just those lines confused me.

But thats really smart!
That awkward moment when I've never drawn anything better...
